评论详情: Awesome shoes that are so comfortable and I have had more comments about them then I do my Jordans. Should be the next hey dudes

Charged me a hidden $16 restocking fee.  Had to dig for it too.  It fronted like it returned in full until I investigated.  Very shady.  It says free returns,  clear as day.  The shoe was nice enough in the hands, but ran big and felt awful and lumpy on my feet.  Would have gladly tried a smaller size but even for a replacement,  they were going to charge me full price and not honor the prime day price.  now disappointmented in both companies.
Although I've only worn these for one day, they make my feet very happy.

Probably one of my favorite shoes I’ve ever worn.  I have a wide foot so the wide toe box is ideal and just an all around comfortable shoe.  By far the most comfortable barefoot shoe I’ve worn yet. True to size so they fit perfectly as well.

Order took more than a month to arrive but it was worth it. I have had problems with big brand shoes as they are too snug and my feet would hurt in them. I watched and read reviews for months before pulling the trigger on this pair. Most reviews recommend you break in on them but I walk barefoot in the house most of the time so it took me very little to get used to them. My heels lock in perfectly but there is plenty of room on the toes. You may want to avoid walking on gravel as the soles really transmit all those textures to the soles of your feet. I may get another pair but I will wait for a few months as these are quite expensive for my taste. I don’t even care if they match my clothes or not. I am too old to be worrying about fashion statements as I worry more about my health.

评论概述: sorry but the don't have a very wide toebox
评论详情: Eats my pinky toe. I am used to wearing Altras and was looking for a more minimal, less cushiony and cheaper alternative. Everything they say about the importance of ground feel and foot splay is true, too bad they don't even allow this with their own product!  Pros: I really like the lockdown on these and the ground feel. Also they look great! Con: The toebox is maybe wide for narrow feet but not mine and doesn't allow the toes to splay as advertised, in fact my pinky toes have sores on them now. I'd rather pay more for an actual wide toebox. Free your toes!

It took a while to adjust to the design of this shoe. I should have read the break in recommendations first. However, I am now adjusted to them and I am really enjoying them. They appear to be solidly made. I would recommend others to give them a try, but read the break in instructions first.

I hope they last. Feel good when you put them on. Have not got to use them much for walking. For around the house and driving have been nice. The only thing I have a problem with is putting them on. Got used to the slip on. Tying shoelaces again is a pain.

评论概述: Sizing is all over the place
评论详情: I bought a pair in my usual size 10 and they were too small. So I bought another pair in size 10.5 so they fit. Then I bought a different style in size 10.5 and THOSE are too small. So I need an 11 for that pair. Don't buy online. Buy them in a store if you can to make sure they fit.

评论概述: With wider shoes I tend to size down a half size
评论详情: I wore them today after receiving just to feel them out the heel drop is immediately noticeable from standard shoes. I want to strengthen my feel rebuild my low arches lengthen my Achilles etc and stop crushing my toes so my search led me to these I have all manner of Nikes dunk new balances etc but I hope these can correct decades of damage if I make them my primary form for and function so far I like they’re roomy enough without looking obnoxious grip is decent they’re lightweight and don’t look terrible style wise.

评论概述: Large toe box on inside only
评论详情: I have a narrow, straight foot and am looking for more room around the pinky toe. These shoes have a larger toe box, but not on the pinky toe side, so didn't work for me. I also found them to be a little hard and flat. Also, the tongue may be a little bit too short, and doesn't wrap up the front of the ankle.
Husband absolutely loves these…tells everyone about them!!!

Felt nice, and light. I had ordered the black/white pair. I received the all black pair. Now I have to deal with the inconvenience of sending back the order and having to wait 30 days for a refund until I can order another pair.
Junk wastw of money
Perfect for working out or anyone who likes the feel of being barefoot. Nice wide front so toes aren’t squeezed against each other.

This is the first time I've purchased shoes like these. I've always seen them and thought they were more of a novelty than anything actually helpful, but after a few of my coworkers told me that I should try them out...I did.  Pros: They're a lot more comfortable than I give them credit for. It's a nice true to size fit. They're really lightweight and I don't really feel like I have them on sometimes. Posture is getting better and my lower back feels better when I wear these.  Cons: Knees hurt to the moon the first few weeks I wore them. I could only wear them for short periods of time before I had to take them off. Due to have no arch or any real support, going from this shoe back to regular shoes throws my balance off a bit sometimes. If you plan to walk a lot in these, REALLY get used to them first or you'll be in a world of hurt later.
Solid shoes, don't wear out easily.
I have owned. These one month.  Laces fraud in one week.  Inside souls slide out as you walk.  Very disappointed

评论概述: didn't take much getting used to, from thin-soled shoes like vans that I like
评论详情: I will say though the tread pattern holds on to snow and dirt pretty well, so be sure to use those doormats well. but I like the shoes otherwise, they're actually foot shaped. if you like how vans feel you won't be uncomfortable.
Great customer service, shipping is rabbit and their product is brand new.
Would not recommend if you are looking for something like the HFS 1. Not as flexible, nor breathable. Nothing barefoot about it. Feels more like a regular shoe.

评论概述: Like walking with a piece of tire tread for a sole
评论详情: The sole was extremely rigid and moved more like a flip-flop than a shoe where it would spring back.  I’ve worn a quite a few  barefoot shoes from different brands and own several pair, but this had to be the worst I’ve tried yet.

After blowing through quite a few of the cheaper barefoot versions, I finally decided to pay the piper and spend the money on high quality shoes. Unfortunately, after only 4 months of wearing them, I'm noticing that their seams are already starting to rip!! Not the barefoot shoes you're looking for if you want a long-term option...

I'm leaving a one star as the seller chose to send me an used item... I know they have a "Sustainability" motto but that's reaching out too far for my liking.  So, no thank you for your used shoes.  Now I'm wondering if I should consider a purchase from this company either from this or their own platform. It was easy to return but I had to go out of my way to return the shoes; this was not a good experience.
About 30 miles per month for 3 months, the sole separated at the toe. I will not purchase this brand again.
Changed all my shoes from adidas ultraboost to Xero. Hasn’t looked back since. Love it.

评论概述: Excellent Quality and Comfort, Stylish Too
评论详情: I recently started my barefoot/minimalist shoe journey and after getting started with some other brands I decided to go with a higher quality shoe. I decided to give these a try and I'm glad I did. They are extremely comfortable and didn't require a ton of breaking in to reach that comfort level. The lacing system makes these perfect for my narrow feet because it helps apply even pressure across my entire foot instead of just the top and sides of my feet like a lot of other shoes I've worn. They are very durable and have amazing grip and slip resistance as well. I've worn these while rucking and haven't experienced any issues transitioning from dry pavement to wet grass and back. I also haven't experienced any issues transitioning from wet pavement to the smooth concrete used inside arenas. Speaking of arenas, these have to be one of the most versatile shoes I've owned because they work perfectly as exercise shoes and also pair extremely well with a casual outfit for a night out. I give these a 9.9/10 recommendation.
Love Xero them. They fit and feel great.

Solid built shoe. I only use them at the gym. Did some lifts, did some cardio, they stay in place but i wouldn’t do anything explosive in them like jumping or jump rope. They are a little too stiff for that. The construction feel like these should be good for a few hundred miles.

These shoes can handle the gym which is a huge plus for me as a gym rat and everyday activities, they're not nonslip that's something to be aware of. Overall they're comfy and absolutely worth the money. I have flat feet so these are amazing for me to help remedy my imbalance, I recommend using toe spacers as well
Zero support, why does this show up when I search for cross training shoes and it’s not worth the price

It is impossible to put these shoes on without the tongue of the shoe slipping far down into the shoe.  Then it is very difficult to pull the tongue back out.  There is nothing in the design of the shoe (a loop on the tongue for the shoe lace or even a tag on the top of the tongue to pull it out) to address this problem.  Total waste of a lot of money.

This is my second pair of these shoes.  It took a few days to get used to the first pair - no blisters and no discomfort and a more natural way of walking compared to traditional runners.  Will definitely buy again.
My husband likes it!
I use these for wing chun
The older you get the more you have to take care of your feet, spread your toes and keep your heels and toes on the same level
My nature boy adult son loves these.

Pros: I usually wear 13 EE but 13 fit me just fine, Very comfortable, quiet, Wide Toe Box, great maneuverability.  Con: would like more stiffness around and below ankle. Make a bowing shape that is not aesthetically pleasant

Let’s see how they hold up but for now theses are the truth. I feel like I can feel the ground again. Had some foot pain for a while in my right foot … was skateboarding very often … did some heavy farmers carries in these shoes and the pain vanished almost immediately.

评论概述: This is NOT a running shoe or cross-training shoe.
评论详情: The Prio is not what is advertised. It is NOT adequate as a running or cross-training shoe; virtually no support, no lateral support, etc. It is, however, good for walking around, traveling (very comfortable on a plane). I will not be buying another pair.

These shoes are great. The run a little short, so if you order a half-size up, they're a perfect fit.  They're just wide enough for my feet to where they have a snug fit.  The faded black color is the coolest looking color Xero has ever made. I really, REALLY hope they don't discontinue it.  I love the flexibility these shoes provide.  They seem significantly more durable than my HFS's, which I still think are a bit of a product flop. The Prio has really redeemed my interest and confidence in Xero.

Shoes don’t fit even close to true size. Your probably going to need 2 sizes up or down from regular shoe size. The problem is, exchanging for another size is impossible with the worst customer service I have ever experienced. They also feel stiff, blocky, and the toe box is much narrower than expected for what was advertised. Highly recommend you look elsewhere to the many other barefoot shoe companies out there
My first pair of zero drop shoes and I love them. Very comfortable, so much so I bought another pair.

Excellent option for those seeking a blend of comfort, flexibility, and lightweight design. One of the standout features for me is its fit, which accommodates various foot shapes and sizes. The wide toe box provides ample room for natural toe splay, making it perfect for those who prioritize foot health and mobility. The shoe's overall flexibility allows for a full range of motion, enhancing comfort during activities. Additionally, its lightweight build ensures it won’t weigh you down, making it ideal for all-day wear. Overall, the Xero Prior offers an exceptional balance of function and comfort.
Perfect quality

评论概述: Good shoes but I wish they were more durable
评论详情: These are my everyday shoes, I wear when it's not winter or raining, and I also play tennis in them for 2-3 hours a day two days a week First off the shoes just feel great. You can feel everything underfoot almost like you're not wearing anything. I have flat feet and my foot pain has gone away after using these for nearly 2 years. That said I wish they were a bit more durable. The treads are completely worn smooth on the toes which I suspect will turn into a hole soon.
great barefoot shoes helped my foot pain problems
Very wide. Very good

评论概述: Great shoe it has really improved everything about my feet
评论详情: All the good things for the team at Xero Shoes. This Prio was my first purchase from Xero and I plan to buy all the rest of my shoes from them. Absolutely revolutionary thinking. Brilliant.
Feels like you aren't wearing shoes. Love these shoes. Have owned a couple pairs now.
I love these shoes. I wear them for all my day-to-day activities. They are super lightweight, flexible and they look good. I will be getting them in different colors.
I haven't had a shoe as comfortable as these since the old school Merrell Trail Gloves from 2012!

评论概述: Great shoes for barefoot bigginers or experienced
评论详情: I have been wearing these to boxing for a while and I’m boxing most shoes Don hold up for very long on the bottom bc of the twisting, but these are still working!

Got a pair of Xero Sandals last year. I like them so much I wanted to buy more of their shoes. Size 11 is my usual shoe size and the Prio is true to size. Will be buying more in the future.  Love being bare foot and these are the next best thing.
These shoes are of great quality and have relieved much tension in my foot!
I got this as a prime day deal! I normally wear a 11 and thats what I got. They fit great. I used to always wear these kind of shoes and missed the wide toe box. Feels so good again!
The shoe is comfortable and looks good. The toe box, even with the wide fit, is still just a little too narrow for me. I can still feel my pinky toe pushing in slightly.

评论概述: Prio and prio suede are two completely different shoes
评论详情: I ordered the prio suede last year and ordered a prio of the same size this year.  I love my prio suede so much so that I brag about them any chance I get. Unfortunately the prio line of shoes do not fit the same. The prio suede sole is allot more flexible. This prio feels like the toe box is smaller and it actually rubs my ankle raw. This is a sad day.

评论概述: Comfortable and my feet don't sweat....
评论详情: I have tried a couple of other brands of "barefoot" style shoes and they all were pretty uncomfortable - my feet didn't really "breathe" and got sweaty, even if only walking.  These are definitely much better, at least after a couple of days using them.  They are true to size, although if you are sort of in-between sizes you would be better off going to the larger size.... I am usually a 9.5 or 10 and I found the 9.5's a little too snug - but they fit my son perfectly, so I didn't return them.  The 10s are great for me.

Probably ideal zero drop shoe for younger person with feet in good condition.  For my old and damaged feet, foot strike (given minimal stack height) feels a bit hard.  I mainly wear them inside the house.  The do appear well made and fit well.

评论概述: Don't buy these shoes! The soles don't last as promised!
评论详情: 36 days of walking daily and both shoes show signs of wear on the tips of the soles and the left sole already has a hole! Look at the picture on the right. I walk 5 miles every morning. 5 miles x 36 days = 180 miles and they guarantee the soles 5000 miles! I am very disappointed and paid a lot more for these shoes to replace my Whitin shoes that lasted for 3 months. The claim of 5000-mile soles is FALSE, FALSE FALSE!!!!!!!!  50-day update of walking daily. 5 miles x 50 days = 250 miles and they show severe wear! Look at the picture on the left. I will never repurchase these! I am going to try the Jackshibo shoes at $19.99. I would rather be out $20.00 than throw away $90.00 on Xero's!

评论概述: Half size bigger, laces need some work, solid shoes!
评论详情: This is my second pair. My first pair lasted a while and are great for working out and everyday tasks. My first pair had weak laces and this pair had the same issues of the sides of the lace coming undone only after a few days of owning them. Just be ready to put better laces on. I found a weak point of the shoe was the straps that are used to secure the shoelace are weak and after time, will rip off. I just make sure I don’t over tighten this pair. I’m happy with my purchase just be ready with a back up pair of shoelaces.
Shipped quickly, will buy again!

Great shoe for what it is. It's really more of the industry standard as an all around shoe. You don't feel everything under your feet, but you feel most of it. I'm just a little more use to less then that as far padding. Great shoe though.

I love everything about this shoe. The look, the comfort, the breathability, everything. They’re so lightweight and simple. They have become my go-to shoe for all everyday activities. I actually bought the white model with red and blue straps about half a year ago (love that style, please continue producing them, Xero! 🙏🏼), walked around in them for days on a trip to Italy, have worn them consistently to work, and have enjoyed wearing them so much that I couldn’t resist getting the black ones with white straps as an alternative color option. Can’t recommend these shoes highly enough.
Definitely considering on getting more in the future, great to walk in, running not 100% sure, a little uncomfortable running long distance in them was an adjustment, but sprinting wasn’t so bad

I loved my Xeros until theyvstart falling apart. Had several pairs and they last less than 6 months before the soles start separating from the shoe. Also, the strap that makes them adjust to your feet have also broken. They fail well before the tread wears out.

I was excited to finally upgrade to some more stylish and better quality barefoot shoes with Xero but unfortunately these just aren’t made for me. I’ll start with I appreciate the color and style and the price point. Also the quality seems nice and it’s got a great bend and it’s light weight. Unfortunately what ultimately made me want to return these was the fit. The toe box on these is just too narrow for me coming from my Whitins. These fall somewhere in between wide toe box and regular toe box shoes but lean towards wider of course. I went up half a size but then the shoes just felt too loose. Probably for some people it’s perfect but I just didn’t feel like these lived up by what was being advertised (I was bombarded by their marketing on Instagram). I’m gonna check out other brands now but I’m pretty bummed that they didn’t work out! Maybe they’ll be perfect for you so I recommend giving them a try because style is in short supply with barefoot shoes.

评论概述: Nice shoes just not for me
评论详情: Shoes were nice but after wearing them they just weren’t for me.

These shoes have soles that are extremely slippery on hard floor. It is unbelievable that shoes like this would be sold - did they ever test them on different surfaces? The soles probably have a coating to protect the cheap polymer material used and that makes them slippery. Do they have a quality control?  The product is completely faulty, unusable, unless you plan to use the shoes on carpet.  In addition, Xero has probably one of the worst customer services, or rather it's non-existent. It is impossible to talk to anyone on the phone, they don't offer that kind of support. All over the website are different flow charts that are supposed to direct a customer to some help or to send an email. But it all ends nowhere. Xero basically refuses to talk to customers or stand behind their product. Very disappointing.
The fit was great. The sole squeaking on hard surfaces was loud and horrible. I would buy again if they change to a Vibram sole.

I love my Xero Shoes. This is the first pair of minimalist shoes that I've ever bought and I must say I'm extremely happy with them. At first I thought I had bought the wrong size but after using it for the first time I realized it was indeed the right size. This is now my go to shoe for all occasions. I might end up getting different ones, as this one may not be appropriate for all occasions.  You too should get one!
Ended up fitting perfect. I mostly do long walks on concrete sidewalks, and the shoes perform with great comfort.

I was looking into barefoot shoes for awhile before pulling the trigger on these. So far being my first pair I’m impressed how durable they feel yet so light. Since I switched over to running in these and working in other zero drop shoes my leg and back soreness has mostly gone away. If you’re looking to try out a zero drop shoe I recommend these.
Fits just as expected. Used mainly for walking and exercize.
The shoe has a fairly narrow toe box for a barefoot shoe

These are the most comfortable shoes that I have ever owned. These shoes are well made and they are worth every penny. I will continue to buy this model for as long as it is available. I have worn these daily for 2 years and they are starting to show some wear. The wear is purely cosmetic and there are no rips or cuts. I wear these without the insole, as I find that to be more comfortable and it gives me a better feel of the ground. As I have not been running for a few years, I cannot specifically say how long they will hold up for that. I intend to start running again and will be using the older pair for that.  Note to Xero Shoes: Thank you for making quality products.

I've tried quite a few barefoot and minimalist shoes, these are the bet hands down. They look the most like a regular shoe, fit great, comfortable, have half sizes (looking at you Vivo) and are affordable as well!  I've been using these as my all rounders, and for me that is trail/hiking, gym and general use around town. Not a runner, but I have done a few trail runs and they're good for that as well. Can't say enough about these shoes, they're awesome!

These shoes are awesome I plan on getting a second pair. I’ve worn them through a 40 hour work week and they’ve hold up very well and they’re super comfortable! Would definitely recommend so far pretty awesome! Definitely feels like you have no shoes on. Just a good note you have to adapt or break them in.

评论概述: Worse than New Balance Men's Minimus 10 V1 in every way
评论详情: Worse than New Balance Men's Minimus 10 V1 in every way. Not as light/soles too thick, clicky steps instead of quiet steps. Harder to slip on and off. Not comfortable and strange spongy feeling near toes.

Based on another review, I ordered 1/2 a size down. That was a mistake. I wear 11.5 W on got these in size 11 on sale and can't exchange them (full refund issued).  I'm bummed. These looked nice and felt comfortable (other than being too small, of course).
Starting wearing Xeros a few years back and my feet have never been happier. So comfortable! The wide toe box is so much more natural than “normal” shoes. Best value ever: well built and durable.

This is my 4th pair of barefoot shoes. I've have feet problems for years so I stopped running and moved to cycling and kayaking. I'm in better shape then most men 40 years younger then me with no extra weight. I've been wearing highly padded trail running shoes with arch insoles and my feet keep getting worse. Stretching and exercising makes them feels good but doesn't solve the problem. So for the last few weeks I have been going barefoot whenever possible and wearing real barefoot shoes. (Not all those that are called barefoot are barefoot shoes) In the short time I've been wearing barefoot shoes my feet have greatly improved.  PROS: As far as looks go the all black pretty much looks like regular sneakers with flat heals. The black is perfect for the office. The sole is zero down. Very thin sole especially when you remove the 2mm flat insole. Laces up nicely but I still ordered tie-free shock laces so they can slip on and off. Expensive but not as bad as some other recommended brands. Good grip but they do squeak. Seems to be very well made. Wide toe box but not as wide as some other brands. Overall comfortable.  CONS: Still too expensive for minimalist shoes. Many reviews complain that they fall apart easily so dependability may be an issue. I will update this review only if they fall apart early.  I'm hoping these work out well. I've been wearing the same New Balance model for over 20 years, replacing them every couple years and I'll do the same with the Xero Prio if they hold up. These will not be used for running or hiking.  Highly recommended

I have been wearing these shoes now for the past 4 months as everyday and every activity shoes. Between running, long walks, and everyday use, I have probably close to 1000miles of movement over the last 4 months. As you see from the photos the wear on the sole and insole is very minimal. These shoes fit perfectly to size chosen. Allows my feet to move freely and allows my feet to stretch as they would naturally barefooted. They breathe really well and do not hold any smell. I normally have stinky feet but these shoes with constant use have had no smell whatsoever. Well worth the money spent on them and I will be buying another pair when these finally do give out which may take a while.
Sized smaller than one would think. Too narrow. The back of the shoe digs into the ankle.
Could use more padding, like Altras.  Not good for long hikes or walks.

评论概述: Great Replacement for the Discontinued New Balance Minimus 10v1
评论详情: My husband was so disappointed when he found out his favorite minimalist running shoes were no longer in production. After a few reddit searches it became clear that New Balance didn't have anything to replace them, so we checked out the Xero shoes and they're a great fit and similar feel as far as heel drop and everything else! Definitely give these a shot if you're looking to replace your New Balance.

评论概述: Overall a good feel with wide toe and zero drop...quality suffers
评论详情: I liked the shoe at first. It was close to my merrell vapor 2s but not quite as good.  The issue is quality. I've never bought shoe glue in my life and I used it once a month on these shoes.  I wanted to love these shoes but they are not going to last a year if you are thinking about purchasing them. I threw them away in less than 2 years.

I got these shoes to wear just knocking around and also for my dumbbell weight training. They exceeded my expectations. Very much like going barefoot without really going barefoot. I wear these without socks and my feet don’t perspire and the shoes don’t get stinky.  I wear a 12 and an athletic shoe but 11 1/2 in these.
Buen material y muy comodos
These are phenomenal zero drop functional shoes.  I’m wearing them for my workouts.  I love the width of the toe box and the balance created from zero drop!  Super comfy and great performing!
I have two pairs of these. They fit great and feel good. Very lightweight.

评论概述: Great lightweight shoe, used for backpacking
评论详情: I was desperate for an ultralight shoe to take when backpacking, something that I could easily slip into my pack and be able to change into once I reach my campsite.  Other folks I know carry Crocs with them, but I refuse (just can't do it).  I sprung for these Xero shoes and they are perfect.  Incredibly lightweight, but really comfortable.  I'm able to change out of my boots after hiking all day and have something really comfortable on that is very capable of doing a bit more exploring around my campsite (unlike flipflops).  They also dry very quickly which is important when using them in the wilderness, they're almost guaranteed to get wet at some point.  I would definitely recommend for anyone serious about ultralight and durable shoes.

The shoes are comfortable but I have had them for 9 months and they are falling apart. Their supposed warranty will cost you 40% of msrp plus tax and shipping which ends up being $60 plus you have to spend $10 to ship your old shoes back. That amounts to paying $70 for a “warranty” on shoes that only cost $94 when new. Complete rip off.
Very thin and lightweight material. Easy on/off. Very comfortable.

评论概述: Ok shoe, not my favorite Xero.
评论详情: I bought these shoes in August and they were not my favorite. I decided I would use them as my gym shoe and not wear them for much else. After only 10 or so wears the shoe started to separate from the sole and I have just not worn them as much. I bought the Speed Force about a month after purchasing these and love them! The Prio just did not work for me.

I dont recommend them. Dangerous, slippery on any surface and xero shoes told me i had to sandpaper or concrete worn them😒 So sad  They told me this after i did buy them:  We do have one style that is certifiably slip resistant - the Prio All Day SR. Although, we are currently out of stock of many sizes. It doesn't look like we'll be getting more of those until the first of next year but I think this would be your best bet for a totally non slip shoe. Besides the Prio All Day SR, we've seen customers use sandpaper or concrete to scuff up the bottoms of their shoes to make them more slip resistant  That was not my plan Sorry
It's comfortable, wide, mobile, I recommend it!
Best shoe I've bought in years

评论概述: Great fit, great looking, very well designed
评论详情: Very impressed, so far
